title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pasta and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Prepare onion-tomato gravy with spices. Add chicken, simmer, and serve hot.
